Articles.Content: As I said I would, here is the trailer for the book "The Martian" By Andy Weir,

This is very nice! Very good job, all of the scenes were very clean, and I thought that your choice of music was a good one!

Universe

Thanks! "You are a memory" is truly an amazing piece, I was really inspired by Nassault, but this is for a choir project actually. I didn't steal anything, all of the shots I made myself, but some of the ideas I got from Nassault's videos!
Awesome! My friend has been reading that, and it sounds really good! Anyways, amazing video!

That book is fantastic. I bet a movie would be pretty awesome.

Actually, scratch the movie idea. It never works.
